Class BasicStyle

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.canvas.model.impl.BasicStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Style, Serializable
public class BasicStyle extends Object implements Style, Serializable
A basic implementation of the Style interface. Represents a style with a background color and a stroke.

This class is serializable to allow persistence.

Includes predefined styles for various use cases.

See Also:
